tool_description: IDfyâ€™s ICMA Verification API enables you to verify if a user is actually a member of ICMA. The verification API is real-time and non-intrusive in nature.

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch API result using the request ID received in responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the verification request.

api_list.name: ICMAI Verification
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to verify if a user is a member of the Institute of Cost and Management Accountants of India (ICMAI). Use the GET Call API to fetch results using the request ID obtained in the response.
